date: # This CSV tracks approval metrics for agent-initiated actions.
# Used by IFC-149: Action preview and rollback UI
# - total_actions: Total agent actions in period
# - modified: Number of actions modified before approval
# - rolled_back: Number of actions rolled back after approval
# - expired: Number of actions that expired without review
# - avg_review_time_ms: Average time to review actions (milliseconds)
# - avg_confidence_approved: Average AI confidence score of approved actions
# - avg_confidence_rejected: Average AI confidence score of rejected actions
# - agent_id: (Optional) Filter by specific agent ID
